      • setSpeeds

        public static void setSpeeds(int lSpd,
             int rSpd,
             boolean move)
        Sets the speeds of the motors and if they should be activated or not
        Parameters:
        lSpd - the speed of the left motor
        rSpd - the speed of the right motor
        move - true if the robot starts moving, false if not

        Parameters:

        speed - the speed of the wheels

        Calculates the position of something at a distance from the current position
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • inBounds

        public static boolean inBounds(Point position)
        Parameters:
        position - the Point of the coordinates of a position you want to check
        Returns:
        true if it is in the arena, not in the opponents zone, and not in the corners, false if it is out of bounds
